title: So I discovered something that might be potentially strong

replies.body:
Let me clear some things up.
Conqueror gets ready by attacking minions, but must be proc'd on an enemy champion with an auto attack. After that any damage against a champion will keep it rolling.
Its true damage is only good against tanky champions, if they are squishy aery Mpen is way better.
Also, since you will be dealing 20% true damage, that is 20% less damage to feed into your shield. As true damage isnt magic damage
It works, and omfg is it fun. Just 3/4 healthed a MF. She had run off for AWHILE before her ghost popped up next to me.

Pretty sure you just need to be "in combat." Since Morde's damage reapplies in ticks it counts as "in combat."

So anything that cancels the speed boost from Mobis or healing from Warmogs would also count for conqueror, I assume

Well the magic pen is useful because of how long the ult damage duration is and it still will deal slightly more damage than what ever MR they have. I don't know, it just works.

I've heard Aerie being better?  This was because Mordekaiser's passive only works on magic damage he deals, making Conqueror reduce his shielding.

Also Aerie can proc multiple times on his ult, increasing the chance of it killing the target.  Finally, he already tends to build magic pen, which means that transferring magic damage to true damage doesn't actually help him much.

I don't actually know this for a fact as I don't play him, but this is what I've heard.
